title: Park Rangers
description: Ever wonder what it’s like to be a park ranger? From preserving wilderness to teaching about historical events, park rangers are the backbone of our national and state parks. In Park Rangers, students will have an inside look at just what it takes to be one. Detailed photographs support a text that addresses various topics including where rangers work, what they do, and what they need to know to get the job done.
meta: experts, glaciers, memorials, museums, national, park ranger, preserve, public, visitors
Main Idea and Details : Main idea and details
